metadata.title: CVE-2019-0220 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.0 to 2.4.38. When the path component of a request URL contains multiple consecutive slashes ('/'), directives such as LocationMatch and RewriteRule must account for duplicates in regular expressions while other aspects of the servers processing will implicitly collapse them.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.38-2ubuntu2').
